description:
In Fooyin, we finally seem to have an upcoming music player application that's worthy of replacing Foobar2000 for those of us who have used it for years.
I've tried basically all of the Linux alternatives, and none of them function as I want them to function.

It's not quite there yet, there are no plugins that I can find, there are many missing features, and it seems somewhat unstable, but this player replicates the Foobar2000 experience well enough that my personal keyboard driven navigation style (for Foobar) works with it.

I look forward to seeing this player reach maturity, and will check back with it periodically, because while I'll still use a wine wrapped Foobar for now, this is definitely on track to replace it in time.

works and looks amazing
wish it had minimize to system tray and volume shortcuts though
отркрыл формат Аудио Ogg Vorbis. Звук чистый, качественное стерео.
